glsa.title: pip: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in pip, which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or local attackers to conduct symlink attacks.

background.p: pip is a tool for installing and managing Python packages.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in pip. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could conduct a Man-in-the-Middle attack to cause pip to execute arbitrary code. A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All pip users should upgrade to the latest version:
